activities: DZone, Inc. (“DZone”) provides a software-based service known as “AnswerHub”.   In the course of providing its software and service, DZone may receive personal information from individuals residing in the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland (“PI”).  DZone may also receive PI from individuals who request information about DZone’s AnswerHub service.  PI is collected online over the internet.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line data relating to customers and potential customers.
recoursemech: DZone will investigate and attempt to resolve complaints and disputes regarding use and disclosure of personal information in accordance with the principles contained in this Policy.  Disputes that cannot be resolved after good faith discussions will be referred to the American Arbitration Association for resolution.
